body:
Hi Radiance folks,

In August I started the Radiance Knowledge Base effort,
based on discussions about documenting Radiance
appeared on this list a while ago
Until now I only have 7 users/writers in the system :-/

We can do better than this, I think! :-)

I have just added a "Unix installation/compile from source" page.
Can Apple lovers please review it and add MacOS X specific
information? Thanks!

Perhaps we could decide who writes what ... volunteers?

Ciao,

Francesco
subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance Knowledge Base: help needed
